mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_omm_spare_out
id,
staff_id,
user_id,
out_time,
describe,
whither,
#{id},
#{staffId},
#{userId},
#{outTime},
#{describe},
#{whither},
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_omm_spare_out
staff_id = #{staffId},
user_id = #{userId},
out_time = #{outTime},
describe = #{describe},
whither = #{whither},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as staff_name,c.name as user_name, d.name as type_name,e.name as model_name from ( select o.staff_id,o.user_id,o.out_time,o.describe,o.whither,s.* from t_omm_spare_out o,t_omm_spare s where o.id = s.id and o.id = #{id} ) a left join t_common_staff b on a.staff_id = b.id left join T_SECURITY_USER c on a.user_id = c.id left join T_OMM_EQUIPMENT_TYPE d on a.type_id = d.id left join T_OMM_EQUIPMENT_MODEL e on a.model_id = e.id
select a.*,b.name from (select count(1) as count,staff_id as id from T_OMM_SPARE_OUT group by staff_id) a left join T_common_staff b on a.id = b.id order by a.count desc
select a.*,b.name from (select count(1) as count,type_id as id from T_OMM_SPARE where status = 0 group by type_id) a left join t_Omm_Equipment_Type b on a.id = b.id order by a.count desc
